name: Grine Mareen
description:
Help Grine Mareen exterminate aliens in this simple Mega Man style platformer.

Controls:
MOVE - WASD
JUMP - Space
SHOOT - LMB

Grine Mareen is a submission for Game Boy Jam 5 #GBJAM5.
Restrictions: 160x144px and 4 colors.
Colors used: #D6E894 #B0C343 #528037 #204533

Jason Norris [DEV]
Gregory Tapper [ART]
Regina Frischano [SFX]
Abstraction [MUSIC]
http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
